titles.title: Saint Seiya Omega
sso
聖闘士星矢Ω[セイントセイヤオメガ]
Saint Seiya Omega
圣斗士星矢Ω

recommendations.recommendation: I don`t understand why this anime have received such a low rating... I was quite skeptical with this anime, but once I watched it I totally got addicted! I watched about 11 episodes in one night. Although the drawing and their armor looks crappy, but the story is very interesting and exciting. I think this anime deserve a much better rating!!

It`s hard to recommend this show. I started watching because it was saint seiya but in truth it has little in common with the old show and I think fans of the original will have a harder time appreciating this.
Regardless I`m not surprised that the show has a low rating, because honestly the start is pretty weak. That said the latest episodes have improved MASSIVELY, and they even thrown a couple of twists, one in particular that I didn`t see coming and was really not expecting from what the show had previously shown.
If it keeps this up it may well become a pretty good show instead of the mediocre one it was until recently. Time will tell.

anime.description: Ever since the Age of the Gods, whenever evil draws near, a Saint will appear. Wielding the arms called a Cross, they battle to protect the goddess Athena who watches over the Earth. Amongst their number was the Bronze Pegasus Saint Seiya and his compatriots whose battles are legendary. Since then, much time has passed. Now, the revival of Mars, the god of war, draws near, and it is time for a new Saint to step into the breach! ~ adapted and translated from official site by Cranston Note: The first episode received an early screening at the Seiya Night event which took place at Shinjuku`s Wald 9 film theatre on Sat., March 31, 2012 from midnight to 6 am. A live screening of the event took place at Umeda`s Burg 7 and 109 Cinemas in Nagoya as well as several overseas theatres, UCI Jardim Sul in Sao Paulo, Brazil, CGR Cinema in Torcy, France and Viewshows Cinemas in Taipei, Taiwan. Regular broadcast of the show started on April 1, 2012.

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: martial arts
tag.description: Various sports or skills, mainly of Japanese origin, that originated as forms of self-defense or attack, such as judo, karate, and kendo.

tag.name: ninja
tag.description: A ninja was a covert agent or mercenary of feudal Japan specializing in unorthodox arts of war. The functions of the ninja included espionage, sabotage, infiltration, and assassination, as well as open combat in certain situations. The ninja, using covert methods of waging war, were contrasted with the samurai, who had strict rules about honor and combat.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: calling your attacks
tag.description: "GIGAAAAAA DRIIIIIILLL BREAKEEEEEERRR" If you can do something more impressive than just throw a punch, your attack(s) must have an equally impressive name. More than that, you have to call it out as you launch the attack. It doesn`t matter if it`s a martial arts move, a magical spell or your secret superweapon, if you can`t say its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Having a special attack is always a must, but not impressive enough. Every special attack needs a name. A really awesome and outstanding name which is easy to remember and even easier and impressive to yell. Because it just is not enough to name your attack. No, to unleash the full power of your attack, you have to call its name in your most MANLY and LOUDEST voice. It does not matter whether it is a martial arts move, a magical spell or flying drills from your mecha, if you can`t call its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Not a requirement but wearing shades while calling your attack makes it at least twice as cool, moreover giving your mecha or magical companion shades too results in an immeasurable level of awesomeness, bringing down every enemy just through the POWER OF YOUR VOICE. A standard feature of practically every mecha, mahou shoujo, high fantasy, or martial arts anime. [Source: TV Tropes]

tag.name: super power
tag.description: Be it an ancient Greek Heracles, a cybernetic muscle-man, or a fourteen year-old girl in a mini-skirted sailor suit. As long as they have super powers, they`re in the show.

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: emotions awaken superpowers
tag.description: During an extreme emotional state — rage, love, hate, angst, sadness, compassion — something inside the character will "click" that will increase greatly his/her power or a new superpower awakes, that surpasses anything achieved by him/her until then.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Gold Saints
character.description: The most powerful Saints in Athena`s Army and personal guard to her, invincible among them since the ages of myth. They wear the 12 Gold Cloths that correspond to the zodiac constellations, the most powerful among the 88 Cloths. The Gold Saints have mastered the seventh sense, the essence of Cosmo, which grants them miraculous abilities, among them, the capacity of attaining the speed of light.

character.name: Silver Saints
character.description: The Saints wearing the second-highest ranked Cloths are the Silver Saints, the specialists in battle. They possess advanced mastery of Cosmo, which enables them to attain speeds ranging from mach 2 to 5, and also grants them tremendous physical strength. When they receive an assignment from the Sanctuary, they go to any part of the world to fulfill it, whatever the cost, using all their power. They represent the true concept of a Saint of Athena.

character.name: Unicorn no Jabu
character.description: The second Bronze Saint to appear in the story was Jabu the Unicorn Saint. As a fellow orphan he had been sent out with 99 more of his brothers by their father Mitsumasa Kido. He achieved the Unicorn Cloth in Algeria and returned to Japan to participate in the Galaxian Wars tournament to receive the Gold Cloth of Sagittarius. He easily defeated Lionet Ban in his first match but was outmatched against Andromeda Shun whose chains proved impenetrable. He returned to his master in Algeria to further his training, and during this time his Cloth came to upgrade itself as well. When Saori Kido had been shot by a golden arrow, he came to her rescue and protected her from the then antagonistic forces of the Sanctuary. After that he came to reside in the Sanctuary and protected it against the Saints Hades had revived, and protected Pegasus Seiya`s sister Seika from the attacks of the god of death.

character.name: Pegasus no Kouga
character.description: A 13 year-old boy, who is destined to become the Pegasus Bronze Saint in the future era. The main character in the series, trained since his early childhood to become a Saint, Kouga is rebellious but also compassionate. He is still unaware of the purpose of having become a Saint in an era of peace, and has yet to discover his destiny. He meets Seiya, who teaches him the importance of friendship. His name means Light Fang in Japanese. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Orion no Eden
character.description: An enigmatic young man, the Orion Saint in the future era. Eden is 15 years old. Mysterious and distant, Eden believes in the dominance of the strong and disregards the weak, putting his faith in his own strength. Unlike in Kurumada`s mythos, in which the Orion Saint belongs to the Silver Saint ranks, in Omega, the Orion Saint is ranked as a Bronze Saint. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Sagittarius no Seiya
character.description: He is now regarded as a legendary Gold Saint in the millieu of Omega. Having defended Athena in the past from powerful enemies, Seiya continues his mission assisted by the Sagittarius Gold Cloth. His name means Star Arrow in Japanese. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Ophiuchus no Shaina
character.description: The female Silver Saint of the Ophiuchus constellation, and long time comrade-in-arms of Pegasus Seiya. Mentor to Kouga. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Kido Saori
character.description: The greek goddess of justice, wisdom and heroic endeavor, who always returns when evil consumes Earth. She took care of the orphaned Kouga as his foster mother. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Tatakai no Kami Mars
character.description: The god of war Mars who was sealed by Seiya years ago, whose resurrection was imminent. To build his ideal world, he attempts to kidnap Athena, to achieve domination. He wears the powerful armor known as Galaxy. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Geki
character.description: The Bear Bronze Saint and long time friend and comrade-in-arms to Pegasus Seiya, now mentor to young Saint apprentices in the era of Omega, in the Palaestra, the instruction grounds of Sanctuary. He trained Lionet Souma to become a Saint. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Dorado no Spear
character.description: The Bronze Saint of the Dorado constellation, still a student in the Palaestra at Sanctuary, the leader of a small gang formed by himself, Caribou Rudolph and Columba Gray. He tests himself and his skills against Aquila Yuna. Spear commands the element of water, used as a razor-sharp weapon. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Gakuenchou Dairi
character.description: One of the of the officers in charge of overseeing the Palaestra. Though he doesn`t look it, he was a Saint in the past, days that seem to be long gone. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Tatsumi Tokumaru
character.description: Saori`s long time butler, still her faithful servant in the universe of Omega. He still keeps his shinai to protect Saori as he did in the past. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Mantis no Ordykia
character.description: One of the Martians, or Mars Knights, the warriors at the service of Mars, a member of their scout troops. His name is a play on the greek name of the italian island Ortygia. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Hydra no Ichi
character.description: The Hydra Bronze Saint and long time friend and comrade-in-arms to Pegasus Seiya, one of the oldest students in the Palestra, in the era of Omega. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Death Watch no Tokisada
character.description: After being defeated by Libra Genbu, Tokisada drags Haruto and Ryuhou to the end of time where he is defeated by Haruto, who finally manages to avenge his friend by awakening his Seventh Sense. Tokisada returns as a Secondary Pallasite, having apparently been saved from the end of time by his new Chrono Tector. As a Pallasite, he wields a clock known as the Death Watch (デスウォッチ Desu Wotchi) that directs his time-based powers, which he now uses as an armor. He easily holds his own against Eden and Haruto, but Subaru`s mysterious Cosmo distracts him long enough for Hyoga to arrive, pitting the former Aquarius Saints against each other. Hyoga`s Absolute Zero Cold Air is too strong for Tokisada`s Chrono Dominion, and Tokisada is left frozen solid. Source: Wikipedia.org

character.name: Mystic Stone no Surtr
character.description: Surtr is a Secondary Pallasite armed with a gem known as the Mystic Stone (ミスティックストーン Misutikku Sutōn) that enables him to produce a barrier that Cosmo cannot penetrate. He can also direct this energy into powerful attacks, magnified by several large crystals in his battle chamber within Pallasvelda. He is within one of the paths leading to Pallasvelda`s internal chambers, battling Koga, Souma, Yuna, and Shun to prevent them from reaching Pallas. Shun discovers that his ability is vulnerable to attacks from normal objects and directs Koga to deliver a blow without his Cloth to destroy the Mystic Stone, ultimately leading to Surtr`s defeat and death from Shun`s Nebula Storm. Source: Wikipedia.org

character.name: Toki no Kami Saturn
character.description: Saturn is the being behind Pallas`s actions, as well the one the Primary Pallasites, Europa, and Mira, directly swear allegiance to. He created the Chrono Tectors and gave the Primary Pallasites their Holy Swords. In order to examine humanity, he became a human boy: Subaru. After a battle with Koga in space, Saturn realizes that his friends still care about him despite his betrayal and concedes defeat, declaring that he is still a Saint, and sends Koga back to Earth. Source: Wikipedia.org

episode.title: 選抜試験! 決死のキャンプに挑め!
Selection Test! Challenge in The Camp of Death!
Concours d`entrée. La course de l`enfer !
Senbatsu Shiken! Kesshi no Camp ni Idome!
episode.summary: The young Bronze Saints are taken by Bear Geki to the Hell Camp, which is full of lethal traps composed of the elements of Cosmo. Those who survive the Camp are elligible to become Silver Saints. Kouga and Souma must work together to overcome the obstacles, all while Souma must avoid fellow Saint Argo`s hostility and haunting memories of his past.

episode.title: 英雄の息子! 龍峰対光牙!
The Son of a Hero! Ryuuhou Versus Kouga
Le fils d`un héros. Ryuho contre Koga !
Eiyuu no Musuko! Ryuuhou Tai Kouga!
episode.summary: Ryuuhou, the son of the legendary Bronze Saint Dragon Shiryuu, returns to the Palaestra after a short absence. The young Saint apprentices are subjected to a strict training to master their Cosmo element. Kouga is later forced to battle Ryuuhou in an intense element-to-element duel.

episode.title: 仮面の掟! 風の聖闘士[セイント]現わる!
Law of the Mask! The Saint of the Wind Appears!
La loi du masque. Le chevalier qui maîtrisait le vent !
Kamen no Okite! Kaze no Saint Arawaru!
episode.summary: Kouga arrives to the Palaestra, guided by Bear Geki and his disciple Souma. There he is greeted by Saint apprentices, who first approach him with hostility. Also, Kouga meets Aquila Yuna, the young female Saint, who teaches him about his constellation and about the code that guides Saint women.

episode.title: 旅立ち! 新世代の聖闘士[セイント]!
Setting Off on a Journey! Saints of the New Generation!
Le départ. Une nouvelle génération de Chevaliers !
Tabidachi! Shinsedai no Saint!
episode.summary: Kouga is worried over the disappearance of Athena and frustrated for his failure to protect her and his mentor Shaina. Kouga is determined to master his Cosmo to rescue his goddess. Kouga departs to improve his mastery over Cosmo, later meeting Souma, the Lionet Bronze Saint, who teaches him about the elements of Cosmo. Eventually, Kouga and Souma are greeted by the challenge of Mantis Ordykia, one of Mars` henchmen, who puts their command over Cosmo to the test, an experience that strengthens their newfound friendship.

episode.title: 星矢が救った命! 甦れ聖闘士[セイント]伝説!
The Life that Seiya Saved! The Saint Legend, Revive!
Sauvé par Seiya. La légende des Chevaliers renaît !
Seiya ga Sukutta Inochi! Yomigaere Saint Densetsu!
episode.summary: Athena Saori watches over peace on Earth from Sanctuary and over young Kouga, until an invader causes commotion when he tries to kidnap Athena and the baby. Kouga is saved from certain death by the timely arrival of Gold Saint Seiya, who engages the mysterious invader, who reveals his identity as Mars. A new conflict begins as Seiya and Mars battle for the fate of Kouga, who years later, determined to live his life as he sees fit, challenges Athena.

episode.title: 星矢のメッセージ! お前たちに, アテナを託す!
A Message from Seiya! I Entrust Athena to You!
Le message de Seiya : Je vous confie Athéna !
Seiya no Message! Omaetachi ni, Athena o Takusu!
episode.summary: The Saints have made it to the Wind Core guarded by Musca Fly. When things look there worst, another friend makes his heroic return! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 受け継がれる小宇宙[コスモ]! 伝説の聖闘士[セイント], 瞬!
The Inherited Cosmo! The Legendary Saint, Shun!
Un cosmos en héritage. Shun, le Chevalier légendaire !
Uketsugareru Cosmo! Densetsu no Saint, Shun!
episode.summary: The Silver Saint Hound Miguel has caught up to Koga , Aria, and Yuna. Koga has told Yuna and Aria to continue while he lured Miguel away. Can he really defeat a Silver Saint alone? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アリアを守れ! 追跡者ソニアの襲撃!
Protect Aria! The Attack of Sonia, the Pursuer!
Protéger Aria coûte que coûte. Sonia la tenace passe à l`attaque !
Aria o Mamore! Tsuisekisha Sonia no Shuugeki!
episode.summary: The Bonze Saints have been labeled traitors and have kidnapped Athena. Mars sends his daughter and two Silver Saints to kill the traitors. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決死の奪還! もう一人の黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!
Suicidal Rescue! The Other Gold Saint!
Sauvetage périlleux. Encore un Chevalier d`or !
Kesshi no Dakkan! Mouhitori no Gold Saint!
episode.summary: After Koga and his friends escape from Palaestra, an impatient Koga decides to head straight to the Sanctuary to find Athena and rescue the mysterious girl. Can 5 young warriors go head to head against a Gold Saint loyal to Mars? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖域[サンクチュアリ]の危機! 忍者聖闘士[セイント], 駆ける!
The Sanctuary in Danger! The Ninja Saint Arrives!
Le sanctuaire menacé. Accours, Chevalier ninja !
Sanctuary no Kiki! Ninja Saint, Kakeru!
episode.summary: Trapped in a cell beneath the school, Koga meets a forgotten Saint. By working together they are able to break out of the jail cell, but the darkness has covered everything. Will Koga be able to save his friends and who is the mysterious girl pretending to be Athena? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宿命の出会い! 衝撃の黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!
A Fateful Meeting! The Unexpected Gold Saint!
Une rencontre prédestinée. Le terrible Chevalier d`or !
Shukumei no Deai! Shougeki no Gold Saint!
episode.summary: Koga senses the arrival of a familiar Cosmo, Athena. Rushing to meet her, he finds it is not Saori, but a scared girl asking for help. The Headmaster appears and explains everything to Koga, then reveals he is Capricorn Ionia, a Gold Saint. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友の拳! 打て,ペガサス流星拳!
The Fists of Friendship! Unleash the Pegasus Ryu Sei Ken!
Les poings d`un ami. Les météores de Pégase !
Tomo no Kobushi! Ute, Pegasus Ryuusei Ken!
episode.summary: After a rough win, Koga has a renewed vigor to win the tournament, but his next opponent might be his toughest. Yuna has her next match against the water element user, Delphinus Guney and the stage is set to his favor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 開幕! 聖闘士[セイント]ファイト!
The Curtain Raises! The Saint Fight!
Lever de rideau. Le tournoi peut commencer !
Kaimaku! Saint Fight!
episode.summary: The fights are starting and the Saints are prepping, except for Koga. His focus is only toward beating Orion Eden and winning the tournament. His first opponent, Circinus Hook., gives Koga some prophetic advice Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 1
迫る毒牙! 陰謀うずまく第二の遺跡!
The Poisonous Fangs Approach! The Second Ruins Surrounded by Intrigue!
Les crocs venimeux. Piège au deuxième vestige !
Semaru Dokuga! Inbou Uzumaku Daini no Iseki!
episode.summary: Hydra Ichi has caught up to the bronze saints after their battle at Yuna’s hometown. He is there to help him but something doesn’t seem right. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 故郷での再会! 雪原の師弟対決!
Reunion at the Homeland! The Master and Disciple`s Duel in the Snowfields!
Retrouvailles en terre natale. L`élève affronte le maître !
¡Reunión en mi ciudad natal! ¡Maestra y discípulo enfrentándose en los campos de nieve!
Kokyou de no Saikai! Setsugen no Shitei Taiketsu!
episode.summary: A trip to Yuna’s homeland has brought back old memories that she has never shared with anyone. And the next Saint sent to stop them is her old mentor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守るべきもの! 聖衣[クロス]の修復師と伝説の鉱石!
We Must Protect Them! The Cloth Repairer and the Legendary Ore!
Protéger ce qui est précieux. Le réparateur d`armures !
Mamorubeki Mono! Cloth no Shuufukushi to Densetsu no Kouseki!
episode.summary: After finally making it across the ocean Koga and his team run into Raki, who has a special power and a unique job. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の星のもとに! 聖闘士[セイント]達の生きる道!
At the Star of Destiny`s Side! The Way of Living of a Saint!
L`étoile de la destinée. La voie des Chevaliers !
Unmei no Hoshi no Moto ni! Saint-tachi no Ikiru Michi!
episode.summary: The next core is beyond the ocean and the Saints have lost their money. Are Saints allowed to have job? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐の炎! 蒼摩, 因縁の闘い!
The Flames of Vengeance! Souma`s Fated Battle!
La flamme de la vengeance. Soma : le combat d`une destinée !
Fukushuu no Honoo! Souma, Innen no Tatakai!
episode.summary: A brief stop in Soma’s hometown is met with cheers and impromptu parties celebrating his arrival. But when he meets the person responsible for his father’s death, a new side of Soma explodes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 五老峰の秘密! 継承せよ, 父, 紫龍の闘志!
The Secret of the Rozan Five Peaks! Inherit the Fighting Spirit of Your Father Shiryu!
Le secret du pic des cinq vieillards. Que la volonté de Shiryu soit transmise à son fils !
Gorouhou no Himitsu! Keishou Seyo, Chichi, Shiryuu no Toushi!
episode.summary: The team continues onward toward the water pillar where they meet up with Ryuho’s parents and the legendary Dragon Shiryu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アリアのために! エデン, 怒りの雷撃!
For Aria`s Sake! Eden, the Thunder of Anger!
Pour Aria. Les foudres d`Eden !
Aria no Tameni! Eden, Ikari no Raigeki!
episode.summary: With Sonia hurt, Eden has reached his tipping point and he will bring back Aria. Can Koga and Yuna stop the son of Mars? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: とべないペガサス! 喪失からの旅立ち!
The Flightless Pegasus! The Journey of Forfeit!
Pégase à terre. Un voyage pour reprendre courage !
Tobenai Pegasus! Soushitsu kara no Tabidachi!
episode.summary: Koga has a battle with a mysterious man inside a cave. Eden tries to understand why Aria left him and the world he is wants to build for her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友への思い! 忍びの道と聖闘士[セイント]の矜持!
Thoughts of a Friend! The Way of the Ninja and the Pride of a Saint!
Ne jamais oublier son compagnon. La voie du ninja, la fierté du Chevalier !
Tomo e no Omoi! Shinobi no Michi to Saint no Kyouji!
episode.summary: Haruto returns to his home of the Fuji-style Ninjas with Ryuho following. After losing sight of Haruto, Ryuho is met with shurikens and kunai’s, it seems Saints are not welcomed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敵陣突入! 若き聖闘士[セイント], 再集結!
Invading the Enemy! The Young Saints, Reunited!
Percée dans les rangs ennemis. Les jeunes Chevaliers à nouveau réunis !
Tekijin Totsunyuu! Wakaki Saint, Saishuuketsu!
episode.summary: The saints come together to attack Mar’s castle in hopes of rescuing Aria. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再会を目指して! 行け, 最後の遺跡へ!
Aiming for the Reunion! Let`s go to the Final Ruins!
Retrouvailles. Rendez-vous au dernier vestige !
Saikai o Mezashite! Ike, Saigo no Iseki e!
episode.summary: Shina-san has joined the team to help recover the Thunder Core, but first she must tell Koga and Aria of their true past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未知なる領域! めぐりあいの時!
Unknown Territory! The Moment of a Chance Meeting!
En territoire inconnu. Le passé envahit le présent !
Michinaru Ryouiki! Meguriai no Toki!
episode.summary: Ryuho, Haruto, and Yuna must face their regrets if they are to escape from darkness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 追憶と復讐! 闇の遺跡の罠!
Remembrance and Revenge! The Trap of the Darkness Ruins!
Souvenirs et vengeance. Le piège du vestige des ténèbres !
Tsuioku to Fukushuu! Yami no Iseki no Wana!
episode.summary: Sonia and Soma must face their past dealing with the death of Southern Cross Kazuma. Eden, Koga, and Aria face a much more difficult trial. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旅の終焉! 少女の光と若者たち!
The Journey`s End! The Girl`s Light and the Youths!
La fin du périple. La lumière de la jeune fille !
Tabi no Shuuen! Shoujo no Hikari to Wakamono-tachi!
episode.summary: Eden, Aria, and Koga have fought through their nightmares and won. Mars is furious and has appeared before the Saints to take what is his. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強の軍団! 黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]集結!
The Strongest Army! The Gathering of the Gold Saints!
L`armée d’élite. Les Chevaliers d`or se rassemblent !
Saikyou no Gundan! Gold Saint Shuuketsu!
episode.summary: A look back on the rise of Mars and the fall of the Saints. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小宇宙[コスモ]の真髄! セブンセンシズ!
The Essence of Cosmo! The Seventh Sense!
L`essence du cosmos. Le septième sens !
Cosmo no Shinzui! Sebun Senshizu!
episode.summary: The secret to Paradox strength is revealed leaving Ryuho confused and Koga knocked out. Paradox love is what keeping Ryuho alive for now… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真[まこと]の恐怖! 巨蟹宮に漂う妖気!
True Fear! The Strange Aura Permeating the House of Cancer!
La terreur infinie. La macabre maison du cancer !
Makoto no Kyoufu! Kyokaikyuu ni Tadayou Youki!
episode.summary: As Koga continues his fight against Taurus, Yuna must challenge Cancer Schiller who unique abilities will have her fight against those she cares for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の分岐点! 双児宮の謎!
Where Fate Diverges! Mystery of the House of Gemini!
Le choix fatidique. L`énigme de la maison des gémeaux !
Unmei no Bunkiten! Soujikyuu no Nazo!
episode.summary: Ryuho has landed at the house of Gemini; he is escorted by a squirrel to a mysterious garden. There he meets the Gold Saint, Paradox, that doesn’t want to fight, but just want love. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 驚異の実力! 金牛宮の聖闘士!
Incredible Power! Saint of the House of Taurus!
Des capacités phénoménales. Le Chevalier du taureau !
Kyoui no Jitsuryoku! Kingyuukyuu no Saint!
episode.summary: Taurus Harbinger, a Gold Saint who enjoys only hearing the sounds of the opponents bones break. With Koga down, his next 4 challengers will become a symphony of pain. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな闘いの幕開け! 黄金十二宮!
Start of a New Battle! The Golden House of Zodiac!
À l`aube d`une nouvelle bataille. Les douze maisons du zodiaque !
Arata na Tatakai no Makuake! Ougon Juunikyuu!
episode.summary: With the last of her strength, Aria saved her friends and sent them to an unexpected place. While there they meet come across an unexpected Saint. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 揺るぎなき守護者! 乙女座の黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!
Steadfast Guardian! The Gold Saint of Virgo!
Un gardien inébranlable. Le Chevalier d`or de la vierge !
Yuruginaki Shugosha! Otomeza no Gold Saint!
episode.summary: The Saints are together again but they are pitted against a Gold Saint that can defeat them without the need of his cloth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 気高きプライド! ミケーネ, 王者の拳!
Noble Pride! Mycenae, Fist of the King!
La loyauté avant tout. Mycène, le poing d`un roi !
Kedakaki Pride! Mycenae, Ouja no Kobushi!
episode.summary: Leo Mycenae thinks back to the time of Mars rise to power as he fights against two losing bronze. Mycenae’s determination wavers as Eden comes to terms to what he must do. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 獅子の拳! エデン, 傷心の闘い!
The Lion`s Fists! Eden`s Battle With His Wounded Heart!
Le poing du lion. Le chagrin d`Eden !
Shishi no Kobushi! Eden, Shoushin no Tatakai!
episode.summary: Eden continues to mourn over Aria while Mars`s forces see this as a sign of weakness. Leo Mycenae steps in and says he will train Eden. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生死の狭間! 冥界の闘い!
Border Between Life and Death! Battle in Hades!
Entre la vie et la mort. Combat au royaume des ombres !
Seishi no Hazama! Meikai no Tatakai!
episode.summary: It`s the final battle in the House of Cancer as Yuna and Koga are sent to the gates of Hades by a Gold Saint. Badly wounded from their previous fights, will they be able to awaken to the Seventh Sense in time? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 2
勇敢なる反逆! エデン,決意の闘志!
Valiant Rebellion! Eden Decides to Fight!
Une rébellion courageuse. La décision d`Eden !
Yuukan naru Hangyaku! Eden, Ketsui no Toushi!
episode.summary: As Eden steps in to fight Virgo Fudo the other Saints take this opportunity to continue ahead to next battle against a Saint that Haruto has history with. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天秤宮の再会! 激突, 黄金対黄金!
Reunion at the House of Libra! A Battle of Gold Versus Gold!
Retrouvailles à la maison de la Balance. Chevalier d`or contre Chevalier d`or !
Tenbinkyuu no Saikai! Gekitotsu, Gold tai Gold!
episode.summary: A battle between Gold Saints is said to be a battle of a thousand days, a fight that always end in a stalemate! The fight between Aquarius and Libra Genbu will rock the young Saints to their very core. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ソニアの覚悟! 因縁の連鎖を断て!
Sonia`s Resolve! Break the Cycle of Fate!
La détermination de Sonia. Rompre les chaînes du destin !
Sonia no Kakugo! Innen no Rensa o Tate!
episode.summary: Sonia has been given a Gold Cloth to fulfill her duty to Mars; Soma intendeds to fight her one on one to end things once and for all. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時貞の野望! 時間の果ての覇者!
Tokisada`s Ambition! The Ruler of the End of Time!
L`ambition de Tokisada. Le conquérant de la fin des temps !
Tokisada no Yabou! Jikan no Hate no Hasha!
episode.summary: Tokisada’s cosmo has been heightened thanks to the being at the end of time. Haruto and Ryuho don’t stand a chance against a powered up Tokisada. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏切りの黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]! イオニア対光牙!
The Traitorous Gold Saint! Ionia Versus Koga!
Le chevalier d`or félon. Ionia contre Koga !
Uragiri no Gold Saint! Ionia Tai Kouga!
episode.summary: Ionia fights for his love of Athena and Koga fights for Saori. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 軍神復活! 突入, 最後の宮!
The War Gods Revive! Attack the Final House!
La résurrection des seigneurs de guerre. À l`assaut de la dernière maison !
Gunshin Fukkatsu! Totsunyuu, Saigo no Kyuu!
episode.summary: Koga is given a choice; remain in the light and watch his friends die or accept the darkness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間のために! 光牙に秘められし力!
For My Friends! Koga`s Hidden Power!
Pour mes compagnons ! La force cachée de Koga !
Nakama no Tame ni! Kouga ni Himerareshi Chikara!
episode.summary: Now that Koga has given himself to the dark side, will his friends be able to stop him and the Four Kings of Mars? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 荒ぶる軍神! マルスとルードヴィグ!
The War God Rages! Mars and Ludwig!
La fureur du dieu de la guerre ! Mars et Ludwig !
Araburu Gunshin! Mars to Ludwig!
episode.summary: Koga finally confronts Mars and before their battle reaches the peak, Eden steps in and Mars tell him how he became the war god. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光牙とエデン! 若き小宇宙[コスモ]よ闇を討て!
Koga and Eden! Destroy the Darkness, Young Cosmo!
Koga et Eden ! Jeunes chevaliers, enflammez votre cosmos contre les ténèbres !
Kouga to Eden! Wakaki Cosmos yo Yami o Ute!
episode.summary: Can Eden and Koga defeat the God of War, Mars whose power has surpassed Athena’s? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 輝け光牙! 光と闇の最終決戦!
Shine, Koga! The Final Battle Between Light and Darkness!
Brille Koga ! L`ultime bataille entre la lumière et les ténèbres !
Kagayake Kouga! Hikari to Yami to Saishuu Kessen!
episode.summary: Koga calls on his friends to burn their Cosmo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星矢に届け! 若き聖闘士達の願い!
Reach Seiya! The Young Saints` Wish!
Le vœu des jeunes Chevaliers ! Entends leur souhait, Seiya !
Seiya ni Todoke! Wakaki Saint-tachi no Negai!
episode.summary: A former Saint comes to help the team in their darkness moment. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇の支配者! アプスの恐怖!
The Ruler of Darkness! The Terror Abzu!
Le maître des ténèbres ! Apsu le terrifiant !
Yami no Shihaisha! Abzu no Kyoufu!
episode.summary: Abzu has taken complete control, and things look bad for the Bronze Saints. But a chance of salvation might happen, but it is up to Eden. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友よ集え! 光牙のみなぎる小宇宙[コスモ]!
Gather, My Friends! Koga`s Overflowing Cosmo!
Compagnons, rassemblez-vous ! L`incroyable cosmos de Koga !
Tomo yo Tsudoe! Kouga no Minagiru Cosmo!
episode.summary: Betrayed by his Sister, Amor tries to kill Koga but the seed planted before has sprouted and true darkness has arisen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: わずかな希望! 新たなる闘いの地!
A Small Hope! Land Where a New Battle Starts!
L`infime espoir ! Un nouveau champ de bataille !
Wazuka na Kibou! Aratanaru Tatakai no Chi!
episode.summary: With Mars gone, Medea’s final plan can finally start as her brother comes to finish off Koga and Eden. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな聖衣[クロス]! 翔べ, 新生[ニュー]ペガサス!
A New Cloth! Fly, New Pegasus!
Arata na Cloth! Tobe, New Pegasus!
episode.summary: A young man has come to challenge Koga, but an older, wiser Koga doesn’t respond to his provocations. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破れ鉄壁の門! 天馬[ペガサス]の矛と龍[ドラゴン]の盾!
Break the Iron Gate! Halberd of Pegasus and Shield of the Dragon!
Yabure Teppeki no Mon! Pegasus no Hoko to Dragon no Tate!
episode.summary: The Saints bust down the gate and enter the city of Pallasvelda. The Saints try to find the way to the castle. Seiya picks the path with the most Pallasites so he can be a decoy. Koga and his friends go the other way and are met by Tarvos. Tarvos is in his heavy armor, and seeing his power Koga sends the others ahead and fights alone. The battle between Koga and Tarvos begins, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 進め聖闘士[セイント]! パラスベルダへの険しき道!
Go Forward, Saints! The Steep Path to Pallasvelda!
Susume Saint! Pallasvelda e no Kewashiki Michi!
episode.summary: Saori risks her life to find Pallas`s hiding place. Koga and his friends go to Pallasvelda, where the Pallasites have their base. They are stopped at a bridge by the Class 3 Pallasite Cyllene. He tries to destroy the bridge, but Haruto appears and saves them. But Subaru recklessly rungs back and is knocked into the chasm below. Subaru is saved by Haruto, but Cyllene and another shadow attack! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星矢, 出陣! アテナの決意!
Seiya Sets Out! Athena`s Resolve!
Seiya, Shutsujin! Athena no Ketsui!
episode.summary: Genbu lost his life defending the Palaestra. His death has many effects on the people around him. Koga and his friends resolve to fight the Pallasites, but many saints have lost the will to fight. Hati sees this as the ideal time to attack the Palaestra and leads his troops. Koga and his friends rally to fight them, but then a golden light appears! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 玄武の死闘! 聖剣対天秤[ライブラ]の剣!
Genbu`s Duel! Holy Blade vs. the Libra Blade!
Genbu no Shitou! Seiken Tai Libra no Ken!
episode.summary: Genbu defeats Aegir and stops him from entering the Palaestra. But Aegir gets the Holy Blade Cataclysm Slash frmo Hyperion and rises to fight again. Genbu is blown away by its destructive Cosmo. And then Aegir uses it to cut apart the time of the people in the Palaestra. To take back their time, Genbu draws the Libra Sword and challenges Aegir. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迫る大軍勢! パライストラ防衛戦!
A Vast Army Approaches! The Battle to Defend the Palaestra!
Semaru Daigunzei! Palaestra Boueisen!
episode.summary: The Saints gather at the Palaestra as former Saints reunite with their current counterparts. Libra Genbu the Palaestra’s commander has harsh words for Kogo and his friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鋼鉄[スチール]の星! 昴よ, 鋼の闘志を抱け!
A Steel Star! Subaru, Embrace Your Steel Will!
Steel no Hoshi! Subaru yo, Hagane no Toushi o Idake!
episode.summary: Koga is visiting a Steel Saint training facility and meets the former Wolf Bronze Saint and Lionet. He gets this chance to learn more about the Steel Saint and Subaru mysterious background. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兄弟の絆! アンドロメダ瞬, 参戦!
The Bonds Between Brothers! Andromeda Shun Joins the Fight!
Kyoudai no Kizuna! Andromeda Shun, Sansen!
episode.summary: As the Pallasites continue to attack small villages, the legendary Andromeda Shun joins the battle but must deal with his past involving Ray Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 四天王現わる! アテナ対パラス全面対決!
The Four Kings Appear! Full-Scale War between Athena and Pallas!
Shitennou Arawaru! Athena Tai Pallas Zenmen Taiketsu!
episode.summary: Athena has summoned all the Saints for an important announcement as the four kings appear in front of Pallas to grant her every wish. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ペガサスを倒せ! 孤高の戦士エデン!
Defeat Pegasus! Eden, the Solitary Soldier!
Pegasus o Taose! Kokou no Senshi Eden!
episode.summary: The promise of reviving those he lost and loved has convinced Eden to join Pallasite. Can Eden the son of Mars do what everyone else has failed and kill Koga? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心に響け! 栄斗のシャウト!
Resonate in the Heart! Haruto`s Shout!
Kokoro ni Hibike! Haruto no Shout!
episode.summary: Koga travels next to recruit Haruto against the rising Pallasites. But the Wolf Haurto life has turned an unexpected direction and he is not quick to give it up. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かけがえのないもの! 目覚めよ, 龍[ドラゴン]!
That Which Is Most Dear! Awaken, Dragon!
Kakegae no Nai Mono! Mezameyo, Dragon!
episode.summary: With is battles over, Ryuho wants to live simple life with his parents, but his father continues to push and train him. Will Ryuho find meaning in his father’s reluctant training or give up the Dragon cloth completely. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勇気を力に! 聖衣[クロス]よ, 生まれ変われ!
Courage Gives Me Power! Let My Cloth Be Reborn!
Yuuki o Chikara ni! Cloth yo, Umarekaware!
episode.summary: Koga and Soma were not the only ones in need of visiting Aries Kiki, the world’s only Cloth repairer. Aquila Yuna has traveled to have her Cloth repaired because of the upcoming danger she has read in the stars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再会! 蒼摩よ, 魂の炎を燃やせ!
Reunited! Soma, Ignite Your Soul`s Flames!
Saikai! Souma yo, Tamashii no Honoo o Moyase!
episode.summary: Koga has travelled to the coliseum to speak with Athena about the rise of the Pallasites. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鋼鉄[スチール]奮闘! 名もなき勇者たち!
The Steel Struggle! The Nameless Heroes!
Steel Funtou! Namonaki Yuusha-tachi!
episode.summary: The battle between the Saints and Pallasites continues in Pallasvelda. Many Steel Saints are there as well. Two of these Steel Saints, Kerry and Ema, are saved from near-certain death by Soma and Subaru. But this makes Ema question why she`s there at all. As she wonders if the Steel Saints aren`t just slowing the others down, Loge and his Pallasite Bees appear! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 昴, 驚異の小宇宙[コスモ]! エデンの使命!
Subaru`s Terrifying Cosmo! Eden`s Task!
Subaru, Kyoui no Cosmo! Eden no Shimei!
episode.summary: The Titans send the class-2 Pallasite Europa to stop the advancing Koga. On his way, Europa encounters Eden, who has been led to the battlefield by a mysterious power. Seiya appears between them, and fearing the power of the gold saint, Europa flees. Seiya tells a doubting Eden to find his own answer to why he fights. And then Europa attacks Koga hoping to defeat the remaining bronzes! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 呪われた聖衣[クロス]!? 小馬座[エクレウス]の聖闘士[セイント]!
The Cursed Cloth!? The Equuleus Saint!
Norowareta Cloth!? Equuleus no Saint!
episode.summary: Koga and friends save a young girl named Selene from the Pallasites, and meet Equuleus Celeris. Celeris leads them to an underground base where people are still moving, but on the way Subaru learns that the Equuleus cloth is called the cursed cloth. It gives its wearer great power, but they are destined to die in battle. Meanwhile, Titan sends Thebe and Hati to stop the Saints from getting any closer to Pallas`s castle! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖衣[クロス]の破壊者! はぐれパラサイト来襲!
The Cloth Destroyer! Attack of the Rogue Pallasite!
Cloth no Hakaisha! Hagure Pallasite Raishuu!
episode.summary: As Koga and friends advance through Pallasvelda they are confronted by a single Pallasite. His name is Miller. He has no rank and no Chronotector, but a powerful gauntlet on his arm. His strength is amazing and he defeats Subaru in a single hit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎の嵐を起こせ! ユナと蒼摩の友情!
Make a Storm of Fire! The Friendship of Yuna and Soma!
Honoo no Arashi o Okose! Yuna to Souma no Yuujou!
episode.summary: Soma and Yuna arrive at a heavily defended Pallasite gate. Yuna insists it`s a shortcut to Pallas`s castle, but Ymir and Metone, two twin Pallasites burning with vengeance, block their path. Soma and Yuna prepare to fight, but Metone makes an unexpected move. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光牙とパラス! 戦場の出会い!
Koga and Pallas! Meeting on the Battlefield!
Kouga to Pallas! Senjou no Deai!
episode.summary: Pallas gets tired of waiting and sneaks out of the castle to the town where the Saints and Pallasites are fighting. Koga meets her as she plays in town by chance, and thinks she`s a normal person. He saves her from the Pallasites attacks, and she takes a liking to him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 定めの邂逅! 双子座[ジェミニ],再び!
A Destined Encounter! Gemini Returns!
Sadame no Kaikou! Gemini, Futatabi!
episode.summary: As the battle against the Pallasites continues, Paradox is rescued from the Cape Sounion prison by Gallia, one of the Four Pallasite Kings. Meanwhile in Pallasvelda, with their cloths repaired by Kiki, Koga and the others are heading back to the front lines. Then Ryuho is cut off and trapped in a mysterious space. He is attacked by Paradox, who is now a Class 2 Pallasite and wearing a chronotector. She tries to get revenge on Ryuho, but a surprising figure stops her! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 貴鬼の闘い! 世代を越えた仲間!
Kiki`s Battle! Comrades Across Generations!
Kiki no Tatakai! Sedai o Koeta Nakama!
episode.summary: The Saints make a forward base inside Pallasvelda. The wounded warriors gather there to heal. Kiki repairs their cloths, and Raki leads Koga`s group there. Shaina and Geki and other old faces are there too. But Dione comes to avenge his loss against Kiki, and attacks. Shaina and the others fight him off while Kiki is busy repairing their cloths. And then their reinforcements arrive! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小馬座[エクレウス]の涙!?覚醒する二つの聖衣[クロス]!
The Tears of Equuleus?! Two Cloths Awaken!
Equuleus no Namida!? Kakusei Suru Futatsu no Cloth!
episode.summary: The underground passage to the castle is destroyed by the Pallasites, and the group is forced to go above ground once more. As the fierce battle between Saints and Pallasites continues, Koga senses a familiar cosmo and turns back. It is Raki, who has come at Kiki`s orders. Koga and Subaru save her from Halimede at the last second. But Subaru is upset that the Equuleus Cloth isn`t doing what he wants. Meanwhile at the Sanctuary, Saori goes to a massive statue of Athena to prepare for the final battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖衣[クロス], 継承! 小馬座[エクレウス]の昴, 誕生!
The Cloth Is Passed On! Equuleus Subaru Is Born!
Cloth, Keishou! Equuleus no Subaru, Tanjou!
episode.summary: The party advances along the route to Pallas`s castle, but Celeris stays behind to protect the people. But Hati attacks to get his revenge on Celeris once he sees Koga is gone. Subaru comes back, though, and Celeris tells him the story of how he got the Equuleus cloth. It was a story of the last Equuleus Saint, Kitalpha, who saved him when he was still a normal person. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 3
攻防一体の刺客! 瞬, 秘策の鎖[チェーン]!
An Assassin Master of Offense and Defense! Shun`s Secret Chain Plan!
Kouhou Ippai no Shikaku! Shun, Hisaku no Chain!
episode.summary: A new Pallasite blocks Koga, Soma, and Yuna as they head into the castle. It is Surtr, wielder of the Mystic Stone, who has come at Aegaeon`s orders. They try to break past him, but his ultimate barrier, "Cosmo Reflect", blocks all their attacks. But Shun comes to save them. Will his Nebula chain be able to break the ultimate barrier? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦の始まり! 宿命の女神のもとへ!
Start of the Final Battle! To the Goddess of Destiny!
Kessen no Hajimari! Shukumei no Megami no Moto e!
episode.summary: Athena`s armies destroy the Gate of Time and secure the way into Pallas`s castle. As they try to find their way through its labyrinth, Ikki and Integra go ahead. Shaina leads the forces protecting them from teh rear, and Koga and the rest go inside. Europa appears, and tells them there are four paths which may lead them to Pallas. They are forced to choose between four paths: Alfheim, Niflheim, Dvergar, and Vanaheim. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 刻よ動け! 集いしアテナの聖闘士[セイント]!
The Hour Has Come! The Saints of Athena Gather!
Toki yo Ugoke! Tsudoishi Athena no Saint!
episode.summary: The "Gate of Time" is the final and greatest barrier to Pallas`s castle. Titan, one of the Four Kings, has stopped time around the gate, and no attack will hurt it. Koga tries to open the gate, and the other bronzes fight off the Pallasites` best troops to open a path for him. With their help, he reaches the gate. Will he be able to open it, and secure the way into Pallas`s castle? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不死鳥! 鳳凰座[フェニックス]の一輝, 見参!
The Immortal Bird! Phoenix Ikki Appears!
Fushichou! Phoenix no Ikki, Kenzan!
episode.summary: Koga and friends arrive at Pallas`s castle, but again they are met by Mira. They are surrounded by flames and have nowhere to run, and begin to lose the battle. But a man appears who walks through the flames as if they were nothing. The man`s name is Phoenix Ikki. Koga welcomes him, but Ikki calls him weak and angrily hits him. Mira is interested in Ikki`s desire to fight alone, and attempts to destroy his cloth! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 紫龍と龍峰! 五老峰の魂!
Shiryu and Ryuho! The Souls of Goroho!
Shiryuu to Ryuuhou! Gorouhou no Tamashii!
episode.summary: Ikki dies in a huge explosion, taking Aigaeon with him. The saints cry at his death. With one of the four kings down, Titan orders Class-2 Pallasite Rhea to kill Shiryuu and Ryuho with the divine spear Gae Bolg, which can peirce anything. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闘志の極み! 一輝対アイガイオン!
The Ultimate Fighting Spirit! Ikki vs. Aegaeon!
Toushi no Kiwami! Ikki Tai Aegaeon!
episode.summary: Ikki appears to save Shun from Aegaeon`s Heavy Lightning Striker. He decides to fight Aegaeon alone, and sends Kouga along to Pallas. A deadly battle between Ikki and Aegaeon begins as their cosmo collides. Ikki repels the gravity of the Heavy Lighting Striker, but Aegaeon uses his ultimate lightning. It destroys the Phoenix Cloth, and at last Ikki falls to the ground! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 刻衣[クロノテクター]装着! 四天王の衝撃!
Chronotector Equipped! The Impact of the Four Kings!
¡Cronotech colocada! ¡El impacto de los cuatro grandes Palasianos!
Chronotector Souchaku! Shitennou no Shougeki!
episode.summary: Koga and his friends at last meet with one of the four Pallasites. His name is Aegaeon, of the Heavy Lightning Strike. They attack him, but his holy sword controls gravity and slams them into the ground before they get close. To protect them, Shun uses his chains. But the Gravitontector, the ultimate Chronotector, makes Aegaeon immune even to Shun`s attacks! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時の王! 氷河, 絶対零度の凍気!
The King of Time! Hyoga`s Powers of Absolute Zero!
Toki no Ou! Hyouga, Zettai Reido no Kooki!
episode.summary: Subaru, Haruto, and Eden let Hyouga handle the Pallasite soldiers and go on ahead. But Haruto sees a cosmo he remembers, and they find themselves in a strange room lined with clocks. There they find Tokisada, who is now a class-2 Pallasite. He is burning with a desire for revenge against Haruto, and uses the power of his Chronotector to stop his own time so that no attacks can hurt him. Eden realizes that they have a chance to attack the second he releases his time stop! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄金[ゴールド]団結! 禁じられた奥義!
The Golds Unite! The Forbidden Technique!
Gold Danketsu! Kinjirareta Ougi!
episode.summary: Hyperion, one of the four kings, goes to kill the golds. With his Cataclysm Slash, he overwhelms them. The Cataclysm Slash has the power to destroy the protons that make up atoms. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖衣[クロス]の秘密! 発動する新たな力!
Secret of the Cloth! A New Power Awakens!
Cloth no Himitsu! Hatsudou Suru Arata na Chikara!
episode.summary: The Bronze Saints escape the labyrinth and reach the battlefield where Galia and the golds are fighting. Galia leads them to a new battleground where she attempts to wipe out the Saints, but the bronzes say that they will fight her alone and send the golds on ahead. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命に抗え! 反逆の告白!
Struggle Against Fate! A Declaration of Rebellion!
Unmei ni Aragae! Hangyaku no Kokuhaku!
episode.summary: Galia, one of the four kings, appears in the middle of the battle between Paradox and Integra. With her Holy Blade, "War God`s Manifestation", she deals a fatal blow to Paradox. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迫る影! アテナ守りし黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!
A Shadow Approaches! The Gold Saints That Protect Athena!
Semaru Kage! Athena Mamorishi Gold Saint!
episode.summary: The Saints travel through four paths in the castle seeking Pallas. But 3 of them are endless loops without exists. Saori and the other Gold Saints have been lured into the one proper path, and are stopped by Paradox. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アテナとパラス! 女神の決戦!
Athena and Pallas! Final Battle Between the Goddesses!
Athena to Pallas! Megami no Kessen!
episode.summary: At last the time has come for Saori and Pallas to fight. Seiya tries to intervene but Saori makes him stand down. In the age of myths, Pallas tried to destroy humanity because she wanted Athena`s love all to herself. To protect the Earth, Athena was forced to defeat her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牡牛[タウラス]突進! 到達, パラスの間!
Raging Taurus! Reach the Throne Room of Pallas!
Taurus Tosshin! Toutatsu, Pallas no Ma!
episode.summary: Saori and the Golds finally reach Pallas`s throne room. The last of the Four Kings, Titan, is waiting for them. Harbinger launches a sudden attack on Pallas, but Titan blocks him and blows him away. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目覚めろ! 究極のΩ!
Awaken! The Ultimate Omega!
Mezamero! Kyuukyoku no Omega!
episode.summary: Hyperion`s Chrono Catastrophe has stopped Subaru`s time. The bronzes rise to battle Hyperion and restore Subaru. And inside his mind, Subaru meets a mysterious man. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 残された意志! 大いなる聖闘士[セイント]の教え!
The Will That Is Left Behind! The Great Teachings of the Saints!
Nokosareta Ishi! Ooinaru Saint no Oshie!
episode.summary: The Bronze Saints feel a huge cosmo explosion and run to the source. They find the horrible damage caused by the Athena Exclamation. The bronzes are struck silent by actions of the Gold Saints. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神を超えろ! 星矢の小宇宙[コスモ]!
Surpass a God! Seiya`s Cosmo!
Kami o Koero! Seiya no Cosmo!
episode.summary: Europa and Mira attack, trying to finish off Athena and Pallas. Hyouga and Shun try to stop them, but are unable to withstand their full power. Meanwhile, Koga gets to Saturn and challenges him, but he and his friends are overwhelmed by the god`s power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 希望の闘士! 聖闘士[セイント]の絆!
Warriors of Hope! The Bonds of the Saints!
Kibou no Toushi! Saint no Kizuna!
episode.summary: Koga and the other saints fly through the sky after Saturn. Meanwhile, Saturn`s personal guard appears on Earth. The Steel Saints fight valiantly to stop them, but Aegir appears again, with his weapon enhanced by a fragment of the Cataclysm Slash. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 刻の神! サターン降臨!
The God of Time! Saturn Arrives!
Toki no Kami! Saturn Kourin!
episode.summary: The god of time, Saturn, who had been sleeping inside Subaru, awakens. The saints try desperately to reach a transformed Subaru, but to no avail. He puts on his Chronotector and draws his sword to fight them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星矢の本心! 偽りからの帰還!
Seiya`s True Feelings! Return from the Lies!
Seiya no Honshin! Itsuwari kara no Kikan!
episode.summary: In his New Gold Cloth, Seiya battles Titan! The two fight for the goddesses they believe in. In the midst of the battle, Seiya tells something to Titan, and when he hears it, Titan laughs. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闘いの果て! 光牙よ, 伝説となれ!
The End of the Battle! Koga, Become a Legend!
Tatakai no Hate! Kouga Yo, Densetsu to Nare!
episode.summary: With the aid of everyoen`s cosmo, Pegasus`s omega cloth evolves even further. Koga challenges Saturn again, and Saturn is shocked at his strength. During the battle, Saturn feels a strange excitement. It is a passion he`s never felt in his long years as a god! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の闘い! ゆけ, Ωの聖闘士[セイント]!
The Last Battle! Go, Saints of Omega!
Saigo no Tatakai! Yuke, Omega no Saint!
episode.summary: Seiya appears to have ended the battle with the golden dagger, but Saturn stops him at the last second. He attacks an exhausted Seiya mercilessly. Koga and the others fight Saturn, but Saturn has defeated the power of Omega and defeats them one by one. Source: crunchyroll
